description: Generate article headlines, body content, and excerpts using AI

required_params.name: topic
required_params.description: What the article should be about

optional_params.name: specific_details
optional_params.description: Specific facts, dates, names, or numbers to include

optional_params.name: organization_context
optional_params.description: Organization info (defaults to Sing for Hope mission)
optional_params.default: Sing for Hope - nonprofit bringing the arts to communities

response_format.title: generated headline (5-10 words)
response_format.content: generated article body (markdown formatted, 2-5 paragraphs based on length)

error_codes.GENERATION_FAILED: I couldn't generate the content. Please try with a different topic or more details.
error_codes.TOPIC_TOO_VAGUE: What should the article be about? I need a clearer topic.
error_codes.RATE_LIMITED: Content generation is temporarily unavailable. Please try again in a moment.
error_codes.INAPPROPRIATE_CONTENT: I can't generate content about that topic. Please try something related to our news and programs.

usage_notes: Always generate title, content, and excerpt together for consistency
Use Sing for Hope's mission and values in content
Excerpt should be compelling and encourage reading
Content should be markdown formatted with proper paragraphs
Include call-to-action when appropriate (learn more, get involved, etc.)
Headline should be specific and engaging, not generic
Respect word counts: short=150-250 words, medium=300-500 words, long=600-800 words
Incorporate user-provided specific details exactly as given
